devdoc.details: FlagsStorage is the main contract to store KYC-related flags for Gateway Token System. KYC flags are identifiable by short identifiers in bytes32 strings. After adding flags  those bit indexes could be used by GatewayToken implementations to associate flags per token.

addFlag(bytes32,uint8).details: Triggers to add new flag into gateway token system

addFlags(bytes32[],uint8[]).details: Triggers to add multiple flags into gateway token system

isFlagSupported(bytes32).details: Triggers to check if a particular flag is supported

isFlagsSupported(bytes32[]).details: Triggers to check if several flags are supported

returns._0: Array of booleans with support per flag

removeFlag(bytes32).details: Triggers to remove existing flag from gateway token system

removeFlags(bytes32[]).details: Triggers to remove multiple existing flags from gateway token system

updateDAOManager(address).details: Triggers to transfer ownership of this contract to new DAO Controller, reverts on zero address and wallet addresses

daoController.details: Triggers to get DAO Controller address

flagIndexes.details: Triggers to get flag index from flags mapping

supportedFlagsMask.details: Triggers to get bitmask of all supported flags

unsupportedFlagsMask.details: Triggers to get bitmask of all unsupported flags

addFlag(bytes32,uint8).notice: Only executed by existing DAO Manager

addFlags(bytes32[],uint8[]).notice: Only executed by existing DAO Manager

removeFlag(bytes32).notice: Only executed by existing DAO Manager

removeFlags(bytes32[]).notice: Only executed by existing DAO Manager

updateDAOManager(address).notice: Only executed by existing DAO Manager
